author: David
message: Thanks a lot! I just started introducing CMake at work and this will be certainly help me a lot when searching something in the help! I always found myself crtl-f'ing through the documentation on the website.

author: Cyrille Berger
message: Does it includes KDE's custom commands ? And I think it would be a nice addition to the kdesdk's scripts collection (if it's not allready the case). And in any case cool idea.

author: Aurélien
message:
Thanks for the positive feedback!

@Cyrille: unfortunately it does not include KDE's custom commands because "cmake --help-command-list" only lists builtin commands.

author: apol
message: #6 This is solved with the head version i mentioned, I recommend you to check it. :)
